control.name: Signature
control.helpHtml: Most useful for mobile and tablet devices, the signature control places a small canvas on the app that can be drawn on by users. There are also options to set the pen thickness and colour.

property.name: Name
property.helpHtml: Name that can be given to the control. Names are used to help identify controls uniquely.

property.name: Line thickness
property.helpHtml: Sets the pen thickness when writing the signature.

property.name: Line colour
property.helpHtml: Sets the pen colour when writing the signature.
